00039 void depth_first_traverse_parital_map(nnode_t *node, int traverse_mark_number, netlist_t *netlist);

00057 /*-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058  * (function: partial_map_top)
00059  *-----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00060 void partial_map_top(netlist_t *netlist)
00061 {
00062         /* depending on the output target choose how to do partial mapping */
00063         if (strcmp(configuration.output_type, "blif") == 0)
00064         {
00065                 /* do the partial map without any larger structures identified */
00066                 depth_first_traversal_to_partial_map(PARTIAL_MAP_TRAVERSE_VALUE, netlist);      
00067         }
00068         else
00069         {
00070                 oassert(FALSE);
00071         }
00072 }
00073 
00074 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00075  * (function: depth_first_traversal_to_parital_map()
00076  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00077 void depth_first_traversal_to_partial_map(short marker_value, netlist_t *netlist)
00078 {
00079         int i;
00080 
00081         /* start with the primary input list */
00082         for (i = 0; i < netlist->num_top_input_nodes; i++)
00083         {
00084                 if (netlist->top_input_nodes[i] != NULL)
00085                 {
00086                         depth_first_traverse_parital_map(netlist->top_input_nodes[i], marker_value, netlist);
00087                 }
00088         }
00089         /* now traverse the ground and vcc pins */
00090         depth_first_traverse_parital_map(netlist->gnd_node, marker_value, netlist);
00091         depth_first_traverse_parital_map(netlist->vcc_node, marker_value, netlist);
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095  * (function: depth_first_traverse)
00096  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00097 void depth_first_traverse_parital_map(nnode_t *node, int traverse_mark_number, netlist_t *netlist)
00098 {
00099         int i, j;
00100         nnode_t *next_node;
00101         nnet_t *next_net;
00102 
00103         if (node->traverse_visited == traverse_mark_number)
00104         {
00105                 return;
00106         }
00107         else
00108         {
00109                 /* ELSE - this is a new node so depth visit it */
00110 
00111                 /* mark that we have visitied this node now */
00112                 node->traverse_visited = traverse_mark_number;
00113 
00114                 for (i = 0; i < node->num_output_pins; i++)
00115                 {
00116                         if (node->output_pins[i]->net == NULL)
00117                                 continue;
00118 
00119                         next_net = node->output_pins[i]->net;
00120                         for (j = 0; j < next_net->num_fanout_pins; j++)
00121                         {
00122                                 if (next_net->fanout_pins[j] == NULL)
00123                                         continue;
00124 
00125                                 next_node = next_net->fanout_pins[j]->node;
00126                                 if (next_node == NULL)
00127                                         continue;
00128 
00129                                 /* recursive call point */
00130                                 depth_first_traverse_parital_map(next_node, traverse_mark_number, netlist);
00131                         }
00132                 }
00133 
00134                 /* POST traverse  map the node since you might delete */
00135                 partial_map_node(node, traverse_mark_number, netlist);
00136         }
00137 }
00138 
00139 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00140  * (function: partial_map_node)
00141  *--------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00142 void partial_map_node(nnode_t *node, short traverse_number, netlist_t *netlist)
00143 {
00144         switch (node->type) 
00145         {
00146                 case BITWISE_NOT:
00147                         instantiate_not_logic(node, traverse_number, netlist);
00148                         break;
00149                 case BUF_NODE:
00150                         instantiate_buffer(node, traverse_number, netlist);
00151                         break;
00152 
00153                 case BITWISE_AND:
00154                 case BITWISE_OR:
00155                 case BITWISE_NAND:
00156                 case BITWISE_NOR:
00157                 case BITWISE_XNOR:
00158                 case BITWISE_XOR:
00159                         if (node->num_input_port_sizes == 2)
00160                         {
00161                                 instantiate_bitwise_logic(node, node->type, traverse_number, netlist);
00162                         }
00163                         else if (node->num_input_port_sizes == 1)
00164                         {
00165                                 instantiate_bitwise_reduction(node, node->type, traverse_number, netlist);
00166                         }
00167                         else    
00168                                 oassert(FALSE);
00169                         break;
00170 
00171                 case LOGICAL_OR:
00172                 case LOGICAL_AND:
00173                 case LOGICAL_NOR:
00174                 case LOGICAL_NAND:
00175                 case LOGICAL_XOR:
00176                 case LOGICAL_XNOR:
00177                         if (node->num_input_port_sizes == 2)
00178                         {
00179                                 instantiate_logical_logic(node, node->type, traverse_number, netlist);
00180                         }
00181                         break;
00182 
00183                 case LOGICAL_NOT:
00184                         /* don't need to do anything since this is a reduction */
00185                         break;
00186 
00187                 case ADD:
00188                         instantiate_add_w_carry(node, traverse_number, netlist);
00189                         break;
00190                 case MINUS:
00191                         if (node->num_input_port_sizes == 2)
00192                         {
00193                                 instantiate_sub_w_carry(node, traverse_number, netlist);
00194                         }
00195                         else if (node->num_input_port_sizes == 1)
00196                         {
00197                                 instantiate_unary_sub(node, traverse_number, netlist);
00198                         }
00199                         else
00200                                 oassert(FALSE);
00201                         break;
00202                 case LOGICAL_EQUAL:
00203                 case NOT_EQUAL:
00204                         instantiate_EQUAL(node, node->type, traverse_number, netlist);
00205                         break;
00206                 case GTE:
00207                 case LTE:
00208                         instantiate_GE(node, node->type, traverse_number, netlist);
00209                         break;
00210                 case GT:
00211                 case LT:
00212                         instantiate_GT(node, node->type, traverse_number, netlist);
00213                         break;
00214                 case SL:
00215                 case SR:
00216                         instantiate_shift_left_or_right(node, node->type, traverse_number, netlist);
00217                         break;
00218                 case MULTI_PORT_MUX:
00219                         instantiate_multi_port_mux(node, traverse_number, netlist);
00220                         break;
00221                 case MULTIPLY:
00222                         if (hard_multipliers != NULL)
00223                         {
00224                                 if ((node->input_port_sizes[0] > min_mult)
00225                                  || (node->input_port_sizes[1] > min_mult))
00226                                 instantiate_hard_multiplier(node, traverse_number, netlist);
00227                         }
00228                         else
00229                                 instantiate_simple_soft_multiplier(node, traverse_number, netlist);
00230                         break;
00231                 
00232                 case ADDER_FUNC:
00233                 case CARRY_FUNC:
00234                 case MUX_2:
00235                 case INPUT_NODE:
00236                 case CLOCK_NODE:
00237                 case OUTPUT_NODE:
00238                 case GND_NODE:
00239                 case VCC_NODE:
00240                 case FF_NODE:
00241                         /* some nodes already in the form that is mapable */
00242                         break;
00243 
00244                 case CASE_EQUAL:
00245                 case CASE_NOT_EQUAL:
00246                 case DIVIDE:
00247                 case MODULO:
00248                 default:
00249                         oassert(FALSE);
00250                         break;
00251         }
00252 }
00253 
00254 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00255  * (function: instantiate_multi_port_mux )
00256  *      Makes the multiport into a series of 2-Mux-decoded 
00257  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00258 void instantiate_multi_port_mux(nnode_t *node, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00259 {
00260         int i, j;
00261         int width_of_one_hot_logic;
00262         int num_ports;
00263         int port_offset;
00264         nnode_t **muxes;
00265         
00266         /* setup the calculations for padding and indexing */
00267         width_of_one_hot_logic = node->input_port_sizes[0];
00268         num_ports = node->num_input_port_sizes;
00269         port_offset = node->input_port_sizes[1];
00270 
00271         muxes = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*(num_ports-1));
00272         for(i = 0; i < num_ports-1; i++)
00273         {
00274                 muxes[i] = make_2port_gate(MUX_2, width_of_one_hot_logic, width_of_one_hot_logic, 1, node, mark);
00275         }
00276 
00277         for(j = 0; j < num_ports - 1; j++)
00278         {
00279                 if (j == 0)
00280                 {
00281                         for(i = 0; i < width_of_one_hot_logic; i++)
00282                         {
00283                                 /* map the inputs to the muxt */
00284                                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+(j+1)*port_offset], muxes[j], width_of_one_hot_logic+i);
00285                                 /* map the one hot logic control */
00286                                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], muxes[j], i);
00287                         }
00288                 }
00289                 else
00290                 {
00291                         for(i = 0; i < width_of_one_hot_logic; i++)
00292                         {
00293                                 /* map the inputs to the muxt */
00294                                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+(j+1)*port_offset], muxes[j], width_of_one_hot_logic+i);
00295                                 /* map the one hot logic control */
00296                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(muxes[j], copy_input_npin(muxes[0]->input_pins[i]), i);
00297                         }
00298                 }
00299                 /* now hookup outputs */
00300                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[j], muxes[j], 0);
00301         }
00302 }
00303 
00304 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00305  * (function: instantiate_not_logic )
00306  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00307 void instantiate_not_logic(nnode_t *node, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00308 {
00309         int width = node->num_input_pins;
00310         nnode_t **new_not_cells;
00311         int i;
00312 
00313         new_not_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00314 
00315         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00316         {
00317                 new_not_cells[i] = make_not_gate(node, mark);
00318         }
00319 
00320         /* connect inputs and outputs */
00321         for(i = 0; i < width; i++)
00322         {
00323                 /* Joining the inputs to the new soft NOT GATES */
00324                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], new_not_cells[i], 0);
00325                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[i], new_not_cells[i], 0);
00326         }
00327 
00328         free(new_not_cells);
00329 }
00330 
00331 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00332  * (function: instantiate_buffer )
00333  *      Buffers just pass through signals
00334  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00335 void instantiate_buffer(nnode_t *node, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00336 {
00337         int width = node->num_input_pins;
00338         int i;
00339 
00340         /* for now we just pass the signals dierectly through */
00341         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00342         {
00343                 int idx_2_buffer = node->input_pins[i]->pin_net_idx;
00344 
00345                 /* join all fanouts of the output net with the input pins net */
00346                 join_nets(node->input_pins[i]->net, node->output_pins[i]->net);
00347 
00348                 /* erase the pointer to this buffer */
00349                 node->input_pins[i]->net->fanout_pins[idx_2_buffer] = NULL;
00350         }
00351 }
00352 
00353 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00354  * (function: instantiate_logical_logic )
00355  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00356 void instantiate_logical_logic(nnode_t *node, int op, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00357 {
00358         int i;
00359         int port_B_offset;
00360         int width_a;
00361         int width_b;
00362         nnode_t *new_logic_cell;
00363         nnode_t *reduction1;
00364         nnode_t *reduction2;
00365 
00366         oassert(node->num_input_pins > 0);
00367         oassert(node->num_input_port_sizes == 2);
00368         oassert(node->num_output_pins == 1);
00369         /* setup the calculations for padding and indexing */
00370         width_a = node->input_port_sizes[0];
00371         width_b = node->input_port_sizes[1];
00372         port_B_offset = width_a;
00373 
00374         /* instantiate the cells */
00375         new_logic_cell = make_1port_logic_gate(op, 2, node, mark);
00376         reduction1 = make_1port_logic_gate(BITWISE_OR, width_a, node, mark);
00377         reduction2 = make_1port_logic_gate(BITWISE_OR, width_b, node, mark);
00378 
00379         /* connect inputs.  In the case that a signal is smaller than the other then zero pad */
00380         for(i = 0; i < width_a; i++)
00381         {
00382                 /* Joining the inputs to the input 1 of that gate */
00383                 if (i < width_a)
00384                 {
00385                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], reduction1, i);
00386                 }
00387                 else
00388                 {
00389                         /* ELSE - the B input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
00390                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(reduction1, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i);
00391                 }
00392         }
00393         for(i = 0; i < width_b; i++)
00394         {
00395                 /* Joining the inputs to the input 1 of that gate */
00396                 if (i < width_b)
00397                 {
00398                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+port_B_offset], reduction2, i);
00399                 }
00400                 else
00401                 {
00402                         /* ELSE - the B input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
00403                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(reduction2, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i);
00404                 }
00405         }
00406 
00407         connect_nodes(reduction1, 0, new_logic_cell, 0);
00408         connect_nodes(reduction2, 0, new_logic_cell, 1);
00409 
00410         instantiate_bitwise_reduction(reduction1, BITWISE_OR, mark, netlist);
00411         instantiate_bitwise_reduction(reduction2, BITWISE_OR, mark, netlist);
00412 
00413         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[0], new_logic_cell, 0);
00414 }
00415 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00416  * (function: instantiate_bitwise_reduction )
00417  *      Makes 2 input gates to break into bitwise
00418  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00419 void instantiate_bitwise_reduction(nnode_t *node, int op, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00420 {
00421         int width;
00422         int i;
00423         int width_a;
00424         nnode_t *new_logic_cell;
00425         short cell_op;
00426 
00427         oassert(node->num_input_pins > 0);
00428         oassert(node->num_input_port_sizes == 1);
00429         oassert(node->output_port_sizes[0] == 1);
00430         /* setup the calculations for padding and indexing */
00431         width = node->output_port_sizes[0];
00432         width_a = node->input_port_sizes[0];
00433 
00434         switch (op)
00435         {
00436                 case BITWISE_AND:
00437                 case LOGICAL_AND:
00438                         cell_op = LOGICAL_AND;
00439                         break;
00440                 case BITWISE_OR:
00441                 case LOGICAL_OR:
00442                         cell_op = LOGICAL_OR;
00443                         break;
00444                 case BITWISE_NAND:
00445                 case LOGICAL_NAND:
00446                         cell_op = LOGICAL_NAND;
00447                         break;
00448                 case BITWISE_NOR:
00449                 case LOGICAL_NOR:
00450                         cell_op = LOGICAL_NOR;
00451                         break;
00452                 case BITWISE_XNOR:
00453                 case LOGICAL_XNOR:
00454                         cell_op = LOGICAL_XNOR;
00455                         break;
00456                 case BITWISE_XOR:
00457                 case LOGICAL_XOR:
00458                         cell_op = LOGICAL_XOR;
00459                         break;
00460                 default:
00461                         oassert(FALSE);
00462         }
00463         /* instantiate the cells */
00464         new_logic_cell = make_1port_logic_gate(cell_op, width_a, node, mark);
00465 
00466         /* connect inputs.  In the case that a signal is smaller than the other then zero pad */
00467         for(i = 0; i < width_a; i++)
00468         {
00469                 /* Joining the inputs to the input 1 of that gate */
00470                 if (i < width_a)
00471                 {
00472                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], new_logic_cell, i);
00473                 }
00474                 else
00475                 {
00476                         /* ELSE - the B input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
00477                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_logic_cell, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i);
00478                 }
00479         }
00480 
00481         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[0], new_logic_cell, 0);
00482 }
00483 
00484 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00485  * (function: instantiate_bitwise_logic )
00486  *      Makes 2 input gates to break into bitwise
00487  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00488 void instantiate_bitwise_logic(nnode_t *node, int op, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00489 {
00490         int width;
00491         int i;
00492         int port_B_offset;
00493         int width_a;
00494         int width_b;
00495         nnode_t **new_logic_cells;
00496         short cell_op;
00497 
00498         oassert(node->num_input_pins > 0);
00499         oassert(node->num_input_port_sizes == 2);
00500         /* setup the calculations for padding and indexing */
00501         width = node->output_port_sizes[0];
00502         width_a = node->input_port_sizes[0];
00503         width_b = node->input_port_sizes[1];
00504         port_B_offset = width_a;
00505 
00506         switch (op)
00507         {
00508                 case BITWISE_AND:
00509                         cell_op = LOGICAL_AND;
00510                         break;
00511                 case BITWISE_OR:
00512                         cell_op = LOGICAL_OR;
00513                         break;
00514                 case BITWISE_NAND:
00515                         cell_op = LOGICAL_NAND;
00516                         break;
00517                 case BITWISE_NOR:
00518                         cell_op = LOGICAL_NOR;
00519                         break;
00520                 case BITWISE_XNOR:
00521                         cell_op = LOGICAL_XNOR;
00522                         break;
00523                 case BITWISE_XOR:
00524                         cell_op = LOGICAL_XOR;
00525                         break;
00526                 default:
00527                         oassert(FALSE);
00528                         break;
00529         }
00530         new_logic_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00531         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00532         {
00533                 /* instantiate the cells */
00534                 new_logic_cells[i] = make_2port_gate(cell_op, 1, 1, 1, node, mark);
00535         }
00536 
00537         /* connect inputs.  In the case that a signal is smaller than the other then zero pad */
00538         for(i = 0; i < width; i++)
00539         {
00540                 /* Joining the inputs to the input 1 of that gate */
00541                 if (i < width_a)
00542                 {
00543                         if (i < width_b)
00544                         {
00545                                 /* IF - this current input will also have a corresponding b_port input then join it to the gate */
00546                                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], new_logic_cells[i], 0);
00547                         }
00548                         else
00549                         {
00550                                 /* ELSE - the B input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
00551                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_logic_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 0);
00552                         }
00553                 }
00554 
00555                 if (i < width_b)
00556                 {
00557                         if (i < width_a)
00558                         {
00559                                 /* IF - this current input will also have a corresponding a_port input then join it to the gate */
00560                                 /* Joining the inputs to the input 2 of that gate */
00561                                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+port_B_offset], new_logic_cells[i], 1);
00562                         }
00563                         else
00564                         {
00565                                 /* ELSE - the A input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
00566                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_logic_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 1);
00567                         }
00568                 }
00569 
00570                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[i], new_logic_cells[i], 0);
00571         }
00572 
00573         free(new_logic_cells);
00574 }
00575 
00576 /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------
00577  * (function: instantiate_add_w_carry )
00578  *      This is for soft addition in output formats that don't handle 
00579  *      multi-output logic functions (BLIF).  We use one function for the 
00580  *      add, and one for the carry.
00581  *------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00582 void instantiate_add_w_carry(nnode_t *node, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00583 {
00584         int width;
00585         int width_a;
00586         int width_b;
00587         int i;
00588         nnode_t **new_add_cells;
00589         nnode_t **new_carry_cells;
00590 
00591         oassert(node->num_input_pins > 0);
00592         oassert(node->num_input_port_sizes == 2);
00593         width = node->output_port_sizes[0];
00594         width_a = node->input_port_sizes[0];
00595         width_b = node->input_port_sizes[1];
00596 
00597         new_add_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00598         new_carry_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00599 
00600         /* create the adder units and the zero unit */
00601         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00602         {
00603                 new_add_cells[i] = make_3port_gate(ADDER_FUNC, 1, 1, 1, 1, node, mark);
00604                 if (i < width - 1)
00605                 {
00606                         new_carry_cells[i] = make_3port_gate(CARRY_FUNC, 1, 1, 1, 1, node, mark);
00607                 }
00608         }
00609 
00610         /* ground first carry in */
00611         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_add_cells[0], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 0);
00612         if (i > 1)
00613         {
00614                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[0], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 0);
00615         }
00616 
00617         /* connect inputs */
00618         for(i = 0; i < width; i++)
00619         {
00620                 if (i < width_a)
00621                 {
00622                         /* join the A port up to adder */
00623                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], new_add_cells[i], 1);
00624                         if (i < width - 1)
00625                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[i], copy_input_npin(new_add_cells[i]->input_pins[1]), 1);
00626                 }
00627                 else 
00628                 {
00629                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_add_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 1);
00630                         if (i < width - 1)
00631                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 1);
00632                 }
00633 
00634                 if (i < width_b)
00635                 {
00636                         /* join the B port up to adder */
00637                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+width_a], new_add_cells[i], 2);
00638                         if (i < width - 1)
00639                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[i], copy_input_npin(new_add_cells[i]->input_pins[2]), 2);
00640                 }
00641                 else
00642                 {
00643                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_add_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 2);
00644                         if (i < width - 1)
00645                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 2);
00646                 }
00647 
00648                 /* join that gate to the output */
00649                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[i], new_add_cells[i], 0);
00650         }
00651         
00652         /* connect carry outs with carry ins */
00653         for(i = 1; i < width; i++)
00654         {
00655                 connect_nodes(new_carry_cells[i-1], 0, new_add_cells[i], 0);
00656                 if (i < width - 1)
00657                         connect_nodes(new_carry_cells[i-1], 0, new_carry_cells[i], 0);
00658         }
00659 
00660         free(new_add_cells);
00661         free(new_carry_cells);
00662 }
00663 
00664 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00665  * (function: instantiate_sub_w_carry )
00666  *      This subtraction is intended for sof subtraction with output formats that can't handle 
00667  *      multi output logic functions.  We split the add and the carry over two logic functions.
00668  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00669 void instantiate_sub_w_carry(nnode_t *node, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00670 {
00671         int width;
00672         int width_a;
00673         int width_b;
00674         int i;
00675         nnode_t **new_add_cells;
00676         nnode_t **new_carry_cells;
00677         nnode_t **new_not_cells;
00678 
00679         oassert(node->num_input_pins > 0);
00680         oassert(node->num_input_port_sizes == 2);
00681         width = node->output_port_sizes[0];
00682         width_a = node->input_port_sizes[0];
00683         width_b = node->input_port_sizes[1];
00684 
00685         new_add_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00686         new_carry_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00687         new_not_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00688 
00689         /* create the adder units and the zero unit */
00690         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00691         {
00692                 new_add_cells[i] = make_3port_gate(ADDER_FUNC, 1, 1, 1, 1, node, mark);
00693                 new_not_cells[i] = make_not_gate(node, mark);
00694                 if (i < width - 1)
00695                 {
00696                         new_carry_cells[i] = make_3port_gate(CARRY_FUNC, 1, 1, 1, 1, node, mark);
00697                 }
00698         }
00699 
00700         /* ground first carry in .  Note the one constant is inputted to start 2's complement */
00701         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_add_cells[0], get_a_one_pin(netlist), 0);
00702         if (i > 1)
00703         {
00704                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[0], get_a_one_pin(netlist), 0);
00705         }
00706 
00707         /* connect inputs */
00708         for(i = 0; i < width; i++)
00709         {
00710                 if (i < width_a)
00711                 {
00712                         /* join the A port up to adder */
00713                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], new_add_cells[i], 1);
00714                         if (i < width - 1)
00715                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[i], copy_input_npin(new_add_cells[i]->input_pins[1]), 1);
00716                 }
00717                 else
00718                 {
00719                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_add_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 1);
00720                         if (i < width - 1)
00721                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 1);
00722                 }
00723 
00724                 if (i < width_b)
00725                 {
00726                         /* join the B port up to adder */
00727                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+width_a], new_not_cells[i], 0);
00728                 }
00729                 else 
00730                 {
00731                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_not_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 0);
00732                 }
00733 
00734                 /* now hookup not to adder parts */
00735                 connect_nodes(new_not_cells[i], 0, new_add_cells[i], 2);
00736                 if (i < width - 1)
00737                         connect_nodes(new_not_cells[i], 0, new_carry_cells[i], 2);
00738 
00739                 /* join that gate to the output */
00740                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[i], new_add_cells[i], 0);
00741         }
00742         
00743         /* connect carry outs with carry ins */
00744         for(i = 1; i < width; i++)
00745         {
00746                 connect_nodes(new_carry_cells[i-1], 0, new_add_cells[i], 0);
00747                 if (i < width - 1)
00748                         connect_nodes(new_carry_cells[i-1], 0, new_carry_cells[i], 0);
00749         }
00750 
00751         free(new_add_cells);
00752         free(new_carry_cells);
00753 }
00754 
00755 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00756  * (function:  instantiate_unary_sub )
00757  *      Does 2's complement which is the equivalent of a unary subtraction as a HW implementation.      
00758  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00759 void instantiate_unary_sub(nnode_t *node, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00760 {
00761         int width;
00762         int width_a;
00763         int i;
00764         nnode_t **new_add_cells;
00765         nnode_t **new_carry_cells;
00766         nnode_t **new_not_cells;
00767 
00768         oassert(node->num_input_pins > 0);
00769         oassert(node->num_input_port_sizes == 1);
00770         width = node->output_port_sizes[0];
00771         width_a = node->input_port_sizes[0];
00772 
00773         new_add_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00774         new_carry_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00775         new_not_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width);
00776 
00777         /* create the adder units and the zero unit */
00778         for (i = 0; i < width; i++)
00779         {
00780                 new_add_cells[i] = make_3port_gate(ADDER_FUNC, 1, 1, 1, 1, node, mark);
00781                 new_not_cells[i] = make_not_gate(node, mark);
00782                 if (i < width - 1)
00783                 {
00784                         new_carry_cells[i] = make_3port_gate(CARRY_FUNC, 1, 1, 1, 1, node, mark);
00785                 }
00786         }
00787 
00788         /* ground first carry in .  Note the one constant is inputted to start 2's complement */
00789         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_add_cells[0], get_a_one_pin(netlist), 0);
00790         if (i > 1)
00791         {
00792                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[0], get_a_one_pin(netlist), 0);
00793         }
00794 
00795         /* connect inputs */
00796         for(i = 0; i < width; i++)
00797         {
00798                 /* join the A port up to adder */
00799                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], new_not_cells[i], 0);
00800                 connect_nodes(new_not_cells[i], 0, new_add_cells[i], 1);
00801                 if (i < width - 1)
00802                         connect_nodes(new_not_cells[i], 0, new_carry_cells[i], 1);
00803 
00804                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_add_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 2);
00805                 if (i < width - 1)
00806                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(new_carry_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 2);
00807 
00808                 /* join that gate to the output */
00809                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[i], new_add_cells[i], 0);
00810         }
00811         
00812         /* connect carry outs with carry ins */
00813         for(i = 1; i < width; i++)
00814         {
00815                 connect_nodes(new_carry_cells[i-1], 0, new_add_cells[i], 0);
00816                 if (i < width - 1)
00817                         connect_nodes(new_carry_cells[i-1], 0, new_carry_cells[i], 0);
00818         }
00819 
00820         free(new_add_cells);
00821         free(new_carry_cells);
00822 }
00823 
00824 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00825  * (function: instantiate_EQUAL )
00826  *      Builds the hardware for an equal comparison by building EQ for parallel lines and then
00827  *      taking them all through an AND tree.
00828  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00829 void instantiate_EQUAL(nnode_t *node, short type, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00830 {
00831         int width_a;
00832         int width_b;
00833         int width_max;
00834         int i;
00835         int port_B_offset;
00836         nnode_t *xnor_gate;
00837         nnode_t *logical_and_gate;
00838 
00839         oassert(node->num_output_pins == 1);
00840         oassert(node->num_input_pins > 0);
00841         oassert(node->num_input_port_sizes == 2);
00842         width_a = node->input_port_sizes[0];
00843         width_b = node->input_port_sizes[1];
00844         width_max = width_a > width_b ? width_a : width_b;
00845         port_B_offset = width_a;
00846 
00847         /* build an xnor bitwise XNOR */
00848         xnor_gate = make_2port_gate(LOGICAL_XNOR, width_a, width_b, width_max, node, mark);
00849         /* build an and bitwise AND */
00850         logical_and_gate = make_1port_logic_gate(LOGICAL_AND, width_max, node, mark);
00851 
00852         /* connect inputs.  In the case that a signal is smaller than the other then zero pad */
00853         for(i = 0; i < width_max; i++)
00854         {
00855                 /* Joining the inputs to the input 1 of that gate */
00856                 if (i < width_a)
00857                 {
00858                         if (i < width_b)
00859                         {
00860                                 /* IF - this current input will also have a corresponding b_port input then join it to the gate */
00861                                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], xnor_gate, i);
00862                         }
00863                         else
00864                         {
00865                                 /* ELSE - the B input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
00866                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(xnor_gate, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i);
00867                         }
00868                 }
00869 
00870                 if (i < width_b)
00871                 {
00872                         if (i < width_a)
00873                         {
00874                                 /* IF - this current input will also have a corresponding a_port input then join it to the gate */
00875                                 /* Joining the inputs to the input 2 of that gate */
00876                                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+port_B_offset], xnor_gate, i+port_B_offset);
00877                         }
00878                         else
00879                         {
00880                                 /* ELSE - the A input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
00881                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(xnor_gate, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i+port_B_offset);
00882                         }
00883                 }
00884 
00885                 /* hook it up to the logcial AND */
00886                 connect_nodes(xnor_gate, i, logical_and_gate, i);
00887         }
00888 
00889         /* join that gate to the output */
00890         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[0], logical_and_gate, 0);
00891 
00892         if (type == LOGICAL_EQUAL)
00893                 instantiate_bitwise_logic(xnor_gate, BITWISE_XNOR, mark, netlist);
00894         else if (type == NOT_EQUAL)
00895                 instantiate_bitwise_logic(xnor_gate, BITWISE_XOR, mark, netlist);
00896         /* Don't need to instantiate a Logic and gate since it is a function itself */
00897 
00898         oassert(logical_and_gate->num_output_pins == 1);
00899 }
00900 
00901 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00902  * (function: instantiate_GT )
00903  *      Defines the HW needed for greter than equal with EQ, GT, AND and OR gates to create
00904  *      the appropriate logic function.
00905  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00906 void instantiate_GT(nnode_t *node, short type, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
00907 {
00908         int width_a;
00909         int width_b;
00910         int width_max;
00911         int i;
00912         int port_A_offset;
00913         int port_B_offset;
00914         int port_A_index;
00915         int port_B_index;
00916         int index = 0;
00917         nnode_t *xor_gate;
00918         nnode_t *logical_or_gate;
00919         nnode_t **or_cells;
00920         nnode_t **gt_cells;
00921 
00922         oassert(node->num_output_pins == 1);
00923         oassert(node->num_input_pins > 0);
00924         oassert(node->num_input_port_sizes == 2);
00925         oassert(node->input_port_sizes[0] == node->input_port_sizes[1]);
00926         width_a = node->input_port_sizes[0];
00927         width_b = node->input_port_sizes[1];
00928         width_max = width_a > width_b ? width_a : width_b;
00929 
00930         /* swaps ports A and B */
00931         if (type == GT)
00932         {
00933                 port_A_offset = 0;
00934                 port_B_offset = width_a;
00935                 port_A_index = 0;
00936                 port_B_index = width_a-1;
00937         }
00938         else if (type == LT)
00939         {
00940                 port_A_offset = width_b;
00941                 port_B_offset = 0;
00942                 port_A_index = width_b-1;
00943                 port_B_index = 0;
00944         }
00945 
00946         /* xor gate identifies if any bits don't match */
00947         xor_gate = make_2port_gate(LOGICAL_XOR, width_a-1, width_b-1, width_max-1, node, mark);
00948         /* collects all the GT signals and determines if gt */
00949         logical_or_gate = make_1port_logic_gate(LOGICAL_OR, width_max, node, mark);
00950         /* collects a chain if any 1 happens than the GT cells output 0 */
00951         or_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width_max-1);
00952         /* each cell checks if A > B and sends out a 1 if history has no 1s (3rd input) */
00953         gt_cells = (nnode_t**)malloc(sizeof(nnode_t*)*width_max);
00954 
00955         for (i = 0; i < width_max; i++)
00956         {
00957                 gt_cells[i] = make_3port_gate(GT, 1, 1, 1, 1, node, mark);
00958                 if (i < width_max-1)
00959                 {
00960                         or_cells[i] = make_2port_gate(LOGICAL_OR, 1, 1, 1, node, mark);
00961                 }
00962         }
00963 
00964         /* connect inputs.  In the case that a signal is smaller than the other then zero pad */
00965         for(i = 0; i < width_max; i++)
00966         {
00967                 /* Joining the inputs to the input 1 of that gate */
00968                 if (i < width_a)
00969                 {
00970                         /* IF - this current input will also have a corresponding b_port input then join it to the gate */
00971                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+port_A_offset], gt_cells[i], 0);
00972                         if (i > 0)
00973                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(xor_gate, copy_input_npin(gt_cells[i]->input_pins[0]), index+port_A_index);
00974                 }
00975                 else
00976                 {
00977                         /* ELSE - the B input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
00978                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(gt_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 0);
00979                         if (i > 0)
00980                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(xor_gate, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), index+port_A_index);
00981                 }
00982 
00983                 if (i < width_b)
00984                 {
00985                         /* IF - this current input will also have a corresponding a_port input then join it to the gate */
00986                         /* Joining the inputs to the input 2 of that gate */
00987                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+port_B_offset], gt_cells[i], 1);
00988                         if (i > 0)
00989                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(xor_gate, copy_input_npin(gt_cells[i]->input_pins[1]), index+port_B_index);
00990                 }
00991                 else
00992                 {
00993                         /* ELSE - the A input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
00994                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(gt_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 1);
00995                         if (i > 0)
00996                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(xor_gate, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), index+port_B_index);
00997                 }
00998 
00999                 if (i < width_max-1)
01000                 {
01001                         /* number of OR gates */
01002                         if (i < width_max-2)
01003                         {
01004                                 /* connect the msb or to the next lower bit */
01005                                 connect_nodes(or_cells[i+1], 0, or_cells[i], 1);
01006                         }
01007                         else
01008                         {
01009                                 /* deal with the first greater than test which autom gets a zero */
01010                                 add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(or_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 1);
01011                         }
01012 
01013                         /* get all the equals with the or gates */
01014                         connect_nodes(xor_gate, i, or_cells[i], 0);
01015                         connect_nodes(or_cells[i], 0, gt_cells[i], 2);
01016                         
01017                 }
01018                 else
01019                 {
01020                         /* deal with the first greater than test which autom gets a zero */
01021                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(gt_cells[i], get_a_zero_pin(netlist), 2);
01022                 }
01023 
01024                 /* hook it up to the logcial AND */
01025                 connect_nodes(gt_cells[i], 0, logical_or_gate, i);
01026 
01027                 if (i > 0)
01028                 {
01029                         index++;
01030                 }
01031         }
01032 
01033         /* join that gate to the output */
01034         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[0], logical_or_gate, 0);
01035         oassert(logical_or_gate->num_output_pins == 1);
01036 
01037         instantiate_bitwise_logic(xor_gate, BITWISE_XOR, mark, netlist);
01038 }
01039 
01040 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01041  * (function: instantiate_GE )
01042  *      Defines the HW needed for greter than equal with EQ, GT, AND and OR gates to create
01043  *      the appropriate logic function.
01044  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01045 void instantiate_GE(nnode_t *node, short type, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
01046 {
01047         int width_a;
01048         int width_b;
01049         int width_max;
01050         int i;
01051         int port_B_offset;
01052         int port_A_offset;
01053         nnode_t *equal;
01054         nnode_t *gt;
01055         nnode_t *logical_or_final_gate;
01056 
01057         oassert(node->num_output_pins == 1);
01058         oassert(node->num_input_pins > 0);
01059         oassert(node->num_input_port_sizes == 2);
01060         oassert(node->input_port_sizes[0] == node->input_port_sizes[1]);
01061         width_a = node->input_port_sizes[0];
01062         width_b = node->input_port_sizes[1];
01063         oassert(width_a == width_b);
01064         width_max = width_a > width_b ? width_a : width_b;
01065 
01066         /* swaps ports A and B */
01067         if (type == GTE)
01068         {
01069                 port_A_offset = 0;
01070                 port_B_offset = width_a;
01071         }
01072         else if (type == LTE)
01073         {
01074                 port_A_offset = width_b;
01075                 port_B_offset = 0;
01076         }
01077 
01078         /* build an xnor bitwise XNOR */
01079         equal = make_2port_gate(LOGICAL_EQUAL, width_a, width_b, 1, node, mark);
01080         gt = make_2port_gate(GT, width_a, width_b, 1, node, mark);
01081         logical_or_final_gate = make_1port_logic_gate(LOGICAL_OR, 2, node, mark);
01082 
01083         /* connect inputs.  In the case that a signal is smaller than the other then zero pad */
01084         for(i = 0; i < width_max; i++)
01085         {
01086                 /* Joining the inputs to the input 1 of that gate */
01087                 if (i < width_a)
01088                 {
01089                         /* IF - this current input will also have a corresponding b_port input then join it to the gate */
01090                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+port_A_offset], equal, i+port_A_offset);
01091                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(gt, copy_input_npin(equal->input_pins[i+port_A_offset]), i+port_A_offset);
01092                 }
01093                 else
01094                 {
01095                         /* ELSE - the B input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
01096                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(equal, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i+port_A_offset);
01097                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(gt, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i+port_A_offset);
01098                 }
01099 
01100                 if (i < width_b)
01101                 {
01102                         /* IF - this current input will also have a corresponding a_port input then join it to the gate */
01103                         /* Joining the inputs to the input 2 of that gate */
01104                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i+port_B_offset], equal, i+port_B_offset);
01105                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(gt, copy_input_npin(equal->input_pins[i+port_B_offset]), i+port_B_offset);
01106                 }
01107                 else
01108                 {
01109                         /* ELSE - the A input does not exist, so this answer goes right through */
01110                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(equal, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i+port_B_offset);
01111                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(gt, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i+port_B_offset);
01112                 }
01113         }
01114         connect_nodes(equal, 0, logical_or_final_gate, 0);
01115         connect_nodes(gt, 0, logical_or_final_gate, 1);
01116 
01117         /* join that gate to the output */
01118         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[0], logical_or_final_gate, 0);
01119         oassert(logical_or_final_gate->num_output_pins == 1);
01120 
01121         /* make the two intermediate gates */
01122         instantiate_EQUAL(equal, LOGICAL_EQUAL, mark, netlist);
01123         instantiate_GT(gt, GT, mark, netlist);
01124 }
01125 
01126 /*---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
01127  * (function: instantiate_shift_left_or_right )
01128  *      Creates the hardware for a shift left or right operation by a constant size.
01129  *-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
01130 void instantiate_shift_left_or_right(nnode_t *node, short type, short mark, netlist_t *netlist)
01131 {
01132         /* these variables are used in an attempt so that I don't need if cases.  Probably a bad idea, but fun */
01133         int width;
01134         int i;
01135         int shift_size;
01136         nnode_t *buf_node;
01137 
01138         width = node->input_port_sizes[0];
01139 
01140         if (node->related_ast_node->children[1]->type == NUMBERS)
01141         {
01142                 /* record the size of the shift */
01143                 shift_size = node->related_ast_node->children[1]->types.number.value;
01144         }
01145         else
01146         {
01147                 error_message(NETLIST_ERROR, node->related_ast_node->line_number, node->related_ast_node->file_number, "Odin only supports constant shifts at present\n");
01148         }       
01149 
01150         buf_node = make_1port_gate(BUF_NODE, width, width, node, mark);
01151 
01152         if (type == SL) 
01153         {
01154                 /* IF shift left */
01155 
01156                 /* connect inputs to outputs */
01157                 for(i = 0; i < width - shift_size; i++)
01158                 {
01159                         // connect higher output pin to lower input pin
01160                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], buf_node, i+shift_size);
01161                 }
01162         
01163                 /* connect ZERO to outputs that don't have inputs connected */
01164                 for(i = 0; i < shift_size; i++)
01165                 {
01166                         // connect 0 to lower outputs
01167                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(buf_node, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i);
01168                 }
01169         
01170                 for(i = width-1; i >= width-shift_size; i--)
01171                 {
01172                         /* demap the node from the net */
01173                         int idx_2_buffer = node->input_pins[i]->pin_net_idx;
01174                         node->input_pins[i]->net->fanout_pins[idx_2_buffer] = NULL;
01175                 }
01176         }
01177         else
01178         {
01179                 /* ELSE shift right */
01180 
01181                 /* connect inputs to outputs */
01182                 for(i = width - 1; i >= shift_size; i--)
01183                 {
01184                         // connect higher input pin to lower output pin
01185                         remap_pin_to_new_node(node->input_pins[i], buf_node, i-shift_size);
01186                 }
01187         
01188                 /* connect ZERO to outputs that don't have inputs connected */
01189                 for(i = width - 1; i >= width - shift_size; i--)
01190                 {
01191                         // connect 0 to lower outputs
01192                         add_a_input_pin_to_node_spot_idx(buf_node, get_a_zero_pin(netlist), i);
01193                 }
01194                 for(i = 0; i < shift_size; i++)
01195                 {
01196                         /* demap the node from the net */
01197                         int idx_2_buffer = node->input_pins[i]->pin_net_idx;
01198                         node->input_pins[i]->net->fanout_pins[idx_2_buffer] = NULL;
01199                 }
01200         }
01201 
01202         for(i = 0; i < width; i++)
01203         {
01204                 remap_pin_to_new_node(node->output_pins[i], buf_node, i);
01205         }
01206         /* instantiate the buffer */
01207         instantiate_buffer(buf_node, mark, netlist);
01208 }
